name: zuora-v2-typescript
description: Typescript for Zuora v2 from swagger file

scripts.build: yarn build-esm && yarn build-cjs && yarn build-types
scripts.build-esm: mkdir -p esm && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && echo '{"type":"module"}' > esm/package.json
scripts.build-cjs: mkdir -p cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > cjs/package.json
scripts.updateSchema: curl --compressed -o './src/swaggerv2API.yaml' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36' -H 'Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8' -H 'Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5' -H 'Referer: https://developer.zuora.com/' 'https://developer.zuora.com/yaml/swaggerv2API.yaml'
